price: «እኔ በኃጢአቴና በኃጢአትህ ልትመለስና ከእሳት ጓዶች ልትኾን እሻለሁ፤ ይኽም የበደለኞች ቅጣት ነው» (አለ)፡፡
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَن تَبُوٓأَ بِإِثۡمِي وَإِثۡمِكَ فَتَكُونَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innī urīdu an tabūa bi-ith'mī wa-ith'mika fatakūna min aṣḥābi al-nāri wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
